label: === SECTION 1: BASIC INFORMATION ===
help_text: This section collects basic country information

label: Country name
help_text: Official name of the country being assessed

label: === SECTION 2: DEMOCRATIC INSTITUTIONS ===
help_text: Assess the quality and presence of democratic institutions

label: Is there a functioning parliament?
help_text: Does the country have an active legislative body?

label: Number of seats
help_text: Total seats in parliament (lower house if bicameral)

label: Regular elections held?
help_text: Are parliamentary elections held at regular intervals?

label: Opposition parties exist?
help_text: Are opposition parties legally permitted and active?

label: Independent judiciary?
help_text: Is the judiciary independent from executive control?

label: === SECTION 3: DIRECT DEMOCRACY ===
help_text: Mechanisms for citizen participation beyond elections

label: Referendum mechanism exists?
help_text: Is there a legal provision for referendums?

label: Signature threshold (%)
help_text: Percentage required to trigger citizen initiative (0 if N/A)

label: Referendums held (last 10 years)
help_text: Number of national referendums in past decade

label: Most recent referendum topic
help_text: Subject of the last national referendum

label: Federal system?
help_text: Is the country organized as a federation?

label: Fiscal autonomy for regions?
help_text: Do regions have independent taxation powers?

label: Overall summary
help_text: Brief summary of key findings (2-3 sentences)
